title: Vistria Group Collecting More Than $2 Billion for Fourth Fund
sub_head: The Chicago firmâ€™s new fund had a $1.5 billion target
body:
Investment firm Vistria Group is on track to collect more than $2 billion for its fourth fund and will hold a final close for it by the second half of this year.
The firm has already collected $900 million for Vistria Fund IV LP, according to documents prepared for a meeting on Wednesday of the investment advisory committee of the Connecticut Retirement Plans and Trust Funds.
